CODIF_DATA.RP_REGULATION: European Union, with participation by GPA countries
CODIF_DATA.HEADING: 01C02

CONTRACTING_BODY.CA_TYPE_OTHER: Contracting authority subjected to Executive Order n°2015-899 of 23.07.2015 and to Decree n°2016-360 of 25.03.2016

TITLE.P: Implementation of the program Mobilize Your City in India

SHORT_DESCR.P: The mission of the consultant shall consist of the coordination and management of the program Mobilize Your City in India.

MAIN_SITE.P: India and the service provider’s office.

SHORT_DESCR.P: The mission of the consultant shall consist of the coordination and management of the program Mobilize Your City in India, which includes:
— the coordination of the technical assistance at local and national level and the capacity building of the public authorities,
— a contribution to the implementation of the communication and visibility plan of the program, (contribution to the preparation of communication documents, participation to local events...)
— a support to the administrative and financial management of the program.

CRITERIA_CANDIDATE.P: — quality of references of candidates demonstrating their experiences in similar projects: Implementation and coordination of project of technical assistance, supervision of elaboration of SUMP and NUMP, supervision of planning studies in the field of urban mobility (40 %),
— quality of skills and expertise of candidates for (40 %):
—— technical assistance for public authorities (20 pts),
— localization of projects demonstrating knowledge of the local context and local representatives (in India) 20 %.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: The contract could be followed by an additional contract concluded in accordance with the article 30-I-7o of decree nº 2016-360 of 25.3.2016.

SUITABILITY.P: Candidates must present the following documents:

— Document 1: application letter DC1 (see attachment or form available at the following address: http://www.economie.gouv.fr/daj/formulaires-declaration-du-candidat), or equivalent (A letter, dated and signed by a person having authority to represent the company, presenting the candidature, indicating whether it is presented by a company or by a consortium of jointly and severally liable companies - size and composition of the applicant group shall be submitted - and each member must present the following documents).

If the applicant is applying as one member of a consortium, the applicant must provide proof that each of the associated independent contractors or companies will put all necessary means at the applicant’s disposal during the execution of the assignment.

— Document 2: copy of the extract of the registration in the register of companies - Kbis in France or equivalent (legal status, etc.) - less than three months old. In the event of judicial reorganization procedure, a copy of any judgement to this effect,

— Document 3: An official declaration that the candidate is not in any of the circumstances referred to in articles 45 and 48 of the Executive order 2015- 899 published on the 23.7.2015 in the Journal Officiel de la République Française (Appendix 1 of the AMI),
— Document 4: In case of identified sub-contractors, for each of them the candidate (or representative of the consortium) must present:
—— A letter, dated and signed by a person having authority to represent the company and by a person having authority to represent the sub-contractor; presenting:
the subcontracted service and its amount.
An official declaration that the subcontractor is not in any of the circumstances referred to in articles 45 and 48 of the Executive Order 2015- 899 of 23.7.2015.

—— A dated and signed certificate indicating how the candidate would contract all declared sub-contractors to execute the relevant tasks for the project. It is specified that a candidate could request that capacity of sub-contractors could be taken into account to appreciate his application (or those of the consortium). In that case, each sub-contractor would provide all documents mentioned below.

— Document 9: a copy of the certificates referred to in Article 51 of the decree nº 2016-360 of 25.3.2016 or an affidavit duly dated and signed by a person empowered to represent the company attesting that the candidate is up to date with its tax obligations and Social services in its country of incorporation.

ECONOMIC_FINANCIAL_INFO.P: Document 5: A statement of the applicant’s gross revenue for the most-recent past three years and a detail of revenue from consulting services featured in this Call for EOI.

TECHNICAL_PROFESSIONAL_INFO.P: Information and formalities necessary for evaluating the ability of the consultant to perform the task:

— Document 6: A list of the main consulting services delivered during the last three years, detailing their value and date, sorted by private- or public-sector customer. Delivery of consulting services should be proven by customer statements or, lacking those, by a sworn statement from the applicant,
— Document 7: a statement of your average annual workforce and number of managerial staff employed during the last 3 years,
— Document 8: indication of the educational and professional qualifications of the management of the company in particular the persons in charge of the bid.

INFO_ADD.P: Newly created companies can apply. If they can not present some of the documents requested in this contract notice, they can demonstrate their financial and professional capacity by other means than those indicated in this notice and in particular by presenting the titles or the professional experience of the or responsible people.
